project.name: TPP-Propositional Domain v1
project.description:
The TPP (Travelling Purchase Problem) consists in selecting a subset of markets such that a given demand of each product can be purchased, minimizing the routing cost and the purchasing cost.
This version (propositional) models a variant of the original TPP where: there can be more than one depot and more than one truck; the amount of goods are discrete and represented by qualitative levels; every type of good has the same price, independent from the market where we buy it; there are two new operators for loading and unloading goods to/from trucks; markets and depots can be indirectly connected.

state.name: Truck load, unload or buy goods

action.precondition: t.at=m and m.onSale(g)=l2 and m.readyToLoad(g)=l3 and l2.next=l1 and l4.next=l3
t.at=m and t.loaded(g)=l3 and m.readyToLoad(g)=l2 and l2.next=l1 and l4.next=l3
t.at=d and t.loaded(g)=l2 and stored(g)=l3 and l2.next=l1 and l4.next=l3
